name: Synaptic Conditioning
flavor: It's a subtle mindset shift. It's not that they're your enemy—you just don't like them!

metadata.flavor: It's a subtle mindset shift. It's not that they're your enemy—you just don't like them!

effects.tier1: 10 psychic damage; the target takes a bane on ability rolls made to harm you or your allies (save ends)
effects.tier2: 14 psychic damage; the target has a double bane on ability rolls made to harm you or your allies (save ends)
effects.tier3: 20 psychic damage; the target considers you and your allies to be their allies when using abilities and features (save ends)

effects.name: Strained
effects.effect: While the target is under this effect, you no longer consider your enemies to be your enemies when using your abilities and features.
